title: MSC Interntational Joie MSC 30605 Mini Grater, 7", Assorted Colors
features: Joie’s Mini Grater easily grates foods with a consistent texture that look great and cook evenly for tastier results
Made from stainless steel and plastic; BPA free; sturdy handle for a secure grip; measures 6.75 x 1.75 x 0.5-inches
Quickly grate foods for preparing recipes easily without the fuss and mess; grate directly where needed, even over pans or dishes
Ideal for semi-soft to hard cheeses, firm fruits and vegetables, block chocolate, and more
Sturdy, durable, easy to use; compact for easy storage; dislodge stubborn food bits with a gentle brush; dishwasher safe for easy cleanup
description: Joie's Mini Grater creates fine pieces in just seconds. A helpful addition to cooking tools, it’s easier than ever to add depths of flavor to favorite dishes in a snap. The sturdy handle allows a secure grip for more vigorous food preparation and grates directly where needed, even over pans while cooking and finishing dishes when plating. Ideal for grating lemon zest, carrots, radishes, apples, and other firm produce, breadcrumbs, semi-soft to hard cheese, like Asiago, Parmesan, Pecorino or Romano, block chocolate, and more. Easy to use. Simply slide food against the blades with an up-and-down motion. Compact for easy storage. Dislodge stubborn food bits with a gentle brush. Made from stainless steel with BPA free plastic, Joie's Mini Grater is sturdy, durable, compact for easy storage, and dishwasher safe for easy cleanup. Joie, by MSC International, brings a creative side to cooking and entertaining with an original-design approach to unique kitchen gadgets and colorful kitchen utensils, all highly functional kitchen items with just the right amount of whimsy.
